channel.title: Helpppp
channel.description:
the source is erased pkz but toggled with, and i changed the client background in the cache and so i made it .zip and put it on dropbox and changed the downloader but when i run it after it downloads cahce it gives me this. [code]Rune Of Gods is loading.. java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException at client.drawLogo(client.java:3948) at client.startUp(client.java:8780) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Starting up 20
[/code] is it because the client background is to big? i think it was a little big..

item.title: Helpppp
item.dc:creator: @macca4g macca4g
item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

The 2nd error is a cache error but im not to sure on the first…

its telling u that the path is wrong aka wrong type of java etc

Read full topic

item.title: Helpppp
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

well i didnt backup because i really need to change it and i dont have the other files to backup but i changed the background so it fits 770 X 503 and now i get this error…

[code]Rune Of Gods is loading…
Rune%20Of%20Gods.zip 72559626
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Rune Of Gods\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system
nnot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileReader.(Unknown Source)
at client.setNewMaps(client.java:80)
at client.startUp(client.java:8754)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:6027)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

[/code]
and when i restart i get the error in my first post

Read full topic

item.title: Helpppp
item.dc:creator: @macca4g macca4g
item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

I’m not 110% just undo what u do and do it step by step and not all at once

if u undo what u did it will work then add a new background then if that works make a backup

then complete your process this way

Read full topic
